Tunable.name: FIREMETER_FREQUENCY
Tunable.description: The game creates a repeating alarm at this frequency to check whether the SimInfoManager has more than the fire meter's threshold before triggering a purge of sim_infos. Please consult a member of performance group before updating this tuning.

Tunable.name: SIM_INFO_ALLOWED_PERCENTAGE_ABOVE_CAP
Tunable.display: Sim Info Allowed Percentage Above Cap
Tunable.description: The game triggers an out-of-cycle story progression action to control population when we cross the current sim info cap plus this percentage. For instance, if this percentage is set to 15% and the current Sim Info cap is 100 Sim Infos, we'll start culling Sim Infos once we cross 115 (100 + 15%). Please consult a member of the performance group before updating this tuning.
